intro: Get ready to care for and play in Your Puppy Veterinary!
description:
Welcome to a world where you are the veterinarian that all puppies need.

Learn how to interact with your adorable pups that come to your clinic seeking help and affection. From taking their temperature to knowing how to play with them, you are the hero who helps them heal and regain their energy!

As you care for them, you can grow your veterinary clinic and turn it into the most beloved place for all four-legged friends.

Plus, as you progress in the game, you will learn new things about your furry friends, such as how to play with them, their favorite types of food, how to train them properly, and much more.

Become the star veterinarian, build your team, and welcome even more puppies in need of love and care!


Game Features:

-Heal puppies with magical tools: use vaccines, bandages, and many more tools to make the puppies feel better.
-Make new furry friends: Learn how to better interact with your favorite pets and create a special bond.
-Upgrade your veterinary clinic: Build your space and equip your clinic with the best instruments and dog care areas.
-Expand your clinic your way: Create colors, toys, and special details to make a happy environment for all the puppies.
-Turn each visit into a game: Every pup is a challenge—take care of them and treat them with love so they leave fully recovered.


Your adventure as a veterinarian begins now!
